 23namespace vsip_csl

 25namespace dispatcher
 26{
 27#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 28template <>
 29struct List<op::svd>
 30{
 31  typedef Make_type_list<be::user,
 32			 be::mercury_sal,
 33			 be::lapack>::type type;
 34};
 35#endif

 40namespace vsip
 41{
 42
 43/// SVD solver object.
 44template <typename = VSIP_DEFAULT_VALUE_TYPE,
 45	  return_mechanism_type ReturnMechanism = by_value>
 46class svd;
 47
 48template <typename T>
 49class svd<T, by_reference>
 50{
 51  typedef typename vsip_csl::dispatcher::Dispatcher<
 52    vsip_csl::dispatcher::op::svd, T>::type
 53  backend_type;
 54
 55public:
 56  svd(length_type rows, length_type cols, storage_type ust, storage_type vst)
 57    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
 58    : backend_(rows, cols, ust, vst)
 59  {}
 60
 61  length_type  rows()     const VSIP_NOTHROW { return backend_.rows();}
 62  length_type  columns()  const VSIP_NOTHROW { return backend_.columns();}
 63  storage_type ustorage() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return backend_.ustorage();}
 64  storage_type vstorage() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return backend_.vstorage();}
 65
 66  template <typename Block0, typename Block1>
 67  bool decompose(Matrix<T, Block0> m, Vector<scalar_f, Block1> dest) VSIP_NOTHROW
 68  { return backend_.decompose(m, dest);}
 69
 70  template <mat_op_type       tr,
 71	    product_side_type ps,
 72	    typename          Block0,
 73	    typename          Block1>
 74  bool produ(const_Matrix<T, Block0> b, Matrix<T, Block1> x) VSIP_NOTHROW
 75  { return backend_.produ<tr, ps>(b, x);}
 76
 77  template <mat_op_type       tr,
 78	    product_side_type ps,
 79	    typename          Block0,
 80	    typename          Block1>
 81  bool prodv(const_Matrix<T, Block0> b, Matrix<T, Block1> x) VSIP_NOTHROW
 82  { return backend_.prodv<tr, ps>(b, x);}
 83
 84  template <typename Block>
 85  bool u(index_type low, index_type high, Matrix<T, Block> dest) VSIP_NOTHROW
 86  { return backend_.u(low, high, dest);}
 87
 88  template <typename Block>
 89  bool v(index_type low, index_type high, Matrix<T, Block> dest) VSIP_NOTHROW
 90  { return backend_.v(low, high, dest);}
 91
 92private:
 93  backend_type backend_;
 94};
 95
 96template <typename T>
 97class svd<T, by_value>
 98{
 99  typedef typename vsip_csl::dispatcher::Dispatcher<
100    vsip_csl::dispatcher::op::svd, T>::type
101  backend_type;
102
103public:
104  svd(length_type rows, length_type cols, storage_type ust, storage_type vst)
105    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
106    : backend_(rows, cols, ust, vst)
107  {}
108  length_type  rows()     const VSIP_NOTHROW { return backend_.rows();}
109  length_type  columns()  const VSIP_NOTHROW { return backend_.columns();}
110  storage_type ustorage() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return backend_.ustorage();}
111  storage_type vstorage() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return backend_.vstorage();}
112  template <typename Block0>
113  Vector<scalar_f>
114  decompose(Matrix<T, Block0> m) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc, computation_error))
115  {
116    Vector<scalar_f> dest(backend_.order());
117    if (!backend_.decompose(m, dest))
118      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(computation_error("svd::decompose"));
119    return dest;
120  }
121
122  template <mat_op_type       tr,
123	    product_side_type ps,
124	    typename          Block>
125  Matrix<T>
126  produ(const_Matrix<T, Block> b) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc, computation_error))
127  {
128    length_type q_rows = rows();
129    length_type q_cols = ustorage() == svd_uvfull ? rows() : backend_.order();
130
131    length_type x_rows, x_cols;
132    if (ps == mat_lside)
133    {
134      x_rows = (tr == mat_ntrans) ? q_rows : q_cols;
135      x_cols = b.size(1);
136    }
137    else /* (ps == mat_rside) */
138    {
139      x_rows = b.size(0);
140      x_cols = (tr == mat_ntrans) ? q_cols : q_rows;
141    }
142    Matrix<T> x(x_rows, x_cols);
143    backend_.produ<tr, ps>(b, x);
144    return x;
145  }
146
147  template <mat_op_type       tr,
148	    product_side_type ps,
149	    typename          Block>
150  Matrix<T>
151  prodv(const_Matrix<T, Block> b) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc, computation_error))
152  { 
153    length_type vt_rows = vstorage() == svd_uvfull ? columns() : backend_.order();
154    length_type vt_cols = columns();
155
156    length_type x_rows, x_cols;
157    if (ps == mat_lside)
158    {
159      x_rows = (tr == mat_ntrans) ? vt_cols : vt_rows;
160      x_cols = b.size(1);
161    }
162    else /* (ps == mat_rside) */
163    {
164      x_rows = b.size(0);
165      x_cols = (tr == mat_ntrans) ? vt_rows : vt_cols;
166    }
167    Matrix<T> x(x_rows, x_cols);
168    backend_.prodv<tr, ps>(b, x);
169    return x;
170  }
171
172  Matrix<T>
173  u(index_type low, index_type high) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc, computation_error))
174  {
175    assert((ustorage() == svd_uvpart && high <= backend_.order()) ||
176	   (ustorage() == svd_uvfull && high <= rows()));
177
178    Matrix<T> dest(rows(), high - low + 1);
179    if (!backend_.u(low, high, dest)) VSIP_IMPL_THROW(computation_error("svd::u"));
180    return dest;
181  }
182
183  Matrix<T>
184  v(index_type low, index_type high) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc, computation_error))
185  {
186    assert((vstorage() == svd_uvpart && high <= backend_.order()) ||
187	   (vstorage() == svd_uvfull && high <= columns()));
188
189    Matrix<T> dest(columns(), high - low + 1);
190    if (!backend_.v(low, high, dest)) VSIP_IMPL_THROW(computation_error("svd::v"));
191    return dest;
192  }
193
194private:
195  backend_type backend_;
196};
197
198} // namespace vsip
199
200#endif
